text: Chillout 2002/The Ultimate Chillout is a compilation album released by Nettwerk. It was released on May 7, 2002. == Critical reception == Billboard considered it a good compilation for those "in need of some post-club musical excursions". == Track listing == Adapted from AllMusic and the album's official liner notes. == Charts == {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2002) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| US Top Dance/Electronic Albums (Billboard) | 23 |- |} == References == == External links == * Category:2002 compilation albums Category:Nettwerk Records compilation albums
title: Chillout 2002/The Ultimate Chillout
